Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_c6d9p136&referenceId=1_c6d9p136&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Wall Street looks set for a flat open ahead of U.S. inflation figures and a raft of earnings from big names including Pfizer, Peloton and Lyft. Nvidia shares fall in premarket after its deal to buy Arm collapsed. U.S. President Joe Biden has warned the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline would be halted if Russia invades Ukraine, but German Chancellor Olaf Scholz did not confirm Biden's comments.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rwTFQI
